Related, is there a way to place text inside an `Axis` with canvas units with the new integrated layouting? I used to have (MakieLayout) a
```LText(scene, bbox = axs[1].scene.px_area, "a", textsize=20, halign=:left, valign=:bottom, padding=(10,10,5,5), font="Dejavu Sans Bold", color=:black)```
to place a letter `a` in the inside of the first plot in `axs[1]`. But now, trying, e.g.,
```GLMakie.Text(fig, bbox = axs[1].scene.px_area, "a", textsize=20, halign=:left, valign=:bottom, padding=(10,10,5,5), font="Dejavu Sans Bold", color=:black)```
throws with a
```ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: no method matching Combined{AbstractPlotting.text,ArgType} where ArgType(::Figure, ::String; bbox=Observable{GeometryBasics.HyperRectangle{2,Int64}} with 10 listeners. Value:
GeometryBasics.HyperRectangle{2,Int64}([132, 132], [209, 361]), textsize=20, halign=:left, valign=:bottom, padding=(10, 10, 5, 5), font="Dejavu Sans Bold", color=:black)
